about.title: What is Sprout?
about.subtitle: Cultivating your tech career in Japan through quality opportunities

paragraphs.p1: Sprout is a curated platform connecting global tech talent with Japan's best opportunities.
paragraphs.p2: We feature vetted positions from innovative companies that value international talent and offer healthy work environments.
paragraphs.p3: Our rigorous screening rejects 90% of applicants to ensure only companies with progressive cultures and global standards are listed.
paragraphs.p4: Whether you're seeking startup agility or corporate stability, we help you find environments where you can truly grow and thrive.

about.cta: Want to deepen your understanding of Japan's tech landscape?
